content: Unknown river at “roughly 850 miles East of Mexico City” in the Tabasco state where a newly discovered huge earthen platform dating back 3,000 years is the now the largest and oldest known Mayan monument. June 3, 2020…image derived from “a three-dimensional image of the ancient Maya Aguada Fenix site based on lidar, an aerial remote-sensing method.”__no.0541, 2020.  #archeology #Mayanculture
